title: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar. Build 200201151. When searching for references to this field, the search results are not being selected.
OB: When searching for references to this field, the search results are not being selected.
EB: You should get 3 matches in method getTempDir().
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the project.
2. Navigate to the method getTempDir().
3. Perform a search for references to this field.
4. Observe that the search results are not being selected properly.
